about_the_game:
June 2020, the month after your father died. He was the only motivation for you to stay in the old town. Now.. You didn't know where else to go or what else to do.

Due to his bad heart, you decided to take care of him full time, causing you to drop out of high-school to focus on the farm.

There's absolutely nothing else left for you here... Until one day, you found a letter from the A.O.A academy, claiming that you have been accepted into their academy.

This surprised you, since you've never attempted to enroll in any academy. Not only that, this letter also contained the number of your old friend, Ashley.

Determine to face your new future, you headed to the A.O.A Academy

Christmas Edition Features:

  • A Holiday Twist on the Story: New events, festive decorations, and seasonal surprises, adding a special charm to the game’s rich narrative.

  • A New Romance Path: New opportunities to explore deeper connections with your dream girl, with special Christmas events that bring your love story to life.

  • Christmas Edition, now with added holiday content, where romance, mystery, and intrigue continue to unfold.

  • Character Holiday Outfits: Admire your favorite characters in new, festive outfits. Whether it's a cozy sweater, a Santa costume, or a chic winter outfit, the characters’ holiday attire adds to the charm and excitement of the season.

A New Beginning in the Season of Miracles

This holiday season, the academy opens its doors wider than ever, and your place in the story has never been clearer. But beneath the glittering decorations, the academy is not as peaceful as it seems. Danger lurks in the shadows, and your relationships will be tested as the snow falls. Can you balance the magic of Christmas with the mysteries surrounding A.O.A Academy?

Find out in this festive edition of A.O.A Academy – where love, mystery, and the holiday spirit await.

content_descriptors.notes: The game graphically depicts sex, usage of drugs and violence. The story is not intended for players being in a dark period of their lives. If you are easily offended or just looking for a fun game only, this game is not for you.
